name: Xul'Grath's Axe of Banishment
lore: The axe of Gorgath's champion. It banishes foes to the underworld immediately after death.

name: Xul'Grath's Unwavering Boots of Fortitude
lore: Boots that have walked throughout many realms.

name: Xul'Grath's Warded Leggings of the Underworld
lore: The tough leggings of Maltai's defender, infused with the might of Gorgath.

name: Xul'Grath's Carapace of Souls
lore: Platemail forged and pervaded by the souls of the underworld. It seems virtually unbreakable.

name: Xul'Grath's Helm of Wisdom
lore: A legendary helmet that possesses vast knowledge of all of Andalucia's history.
